db:abstract.db:para: Allows manipulating the window's thumbnail toolbar.
This type was introduced in QtWinExtras 1.0.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This class allows an application to embed a toolbar in the thumbnail of a window, which is shown when hovering over its taskbar icon. It provides quick access to the window's commands without requiring the user to restore or activate the window.

db:section.db:title: Example
[since 5.4] iconicLivePreviewSource : url
db:section.db:para: The pixmap for use as a live (peek) preview when tabbing into the application.
This property was introduced in Qt 5.4.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.4] iconicNotificationsEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the signals iconicThumbnailRequested() or iconicLivePreviewRequested() will be emitted.
This property was introduced in Qt 5.4.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.4] iconicThumbnailSource : url
db:section.db:para: The pixmap for use as a thumbnail representation
This property was introduced in Qt 5.4.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.4] iconicLivePreviewRequested()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the operating system requests a new iconic live preview pixmap, typically when the user ALT-tabs to the application.
This signal was introduced in Qt 5.4.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.4] iconicThumbnailRequested()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the operating system requests a new iconic thumbnail pixmap, typically when the thumbnail is shown.
This signal was introduced in Qt 5.4.
